Container: Regional date/time formatting strings and settings
Full month names, corresponds the %B specifier
Full month names, corresponds the %n specifier
Abbreviated month names, corresponds the %b specifier
Full weekday names, corresponds the %A specifier
Abbreviated weekday names, corresponds the %a specifier
0: the number precedes before interval string (eg: 2 days)
1: the number follows after interval string (eg: days 2)
